verses.verse: <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for he hath <S%H2963>torn<s%>, and he will <S%H7495>heal<s%> us; he hath <S%H5221>smitten<s%>, and he will bind us <S%H2280>up<s%>.
After two <S%H3117>days<s%> will he <S%H2421>revive<s%> us: in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he will raise us <S%H6965>up<s%>, and we shall <S%H2421>live<s%> in his <S%H6440>sight<s%>.

Then shall we <S%H3045>know<s%>, if we <S%H7291>follow<s%> on to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: his going <S%H4161>forth<s%> is <S%H3559>prepared<s%> as the <S%H7837>morning<s%>; and he shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto us as the <S%H1653>rain<s%>, as the <S%H4456>latter<s%> and former <S%H3384>rain<s%> unto the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Â¶ O <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, what shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee? O <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, what shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee? for your <S%H2617>goodness<s%> is as a <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and as the <S%H7925>early<s%> <S%H2919>dew<s%> it goeth <S%H1980>away<s%>.

Therefore have I <S%H2672>hewed<s%> them by the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>; I have <S%H2026>slain<s%> them by the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: and thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are as the <S%H216>light<s%> that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%>.
For I <S%H2654>desired<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, and not <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>; and the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> more than burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>.
But they like <S%H120>men<s%> have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>: there have they dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against me.
<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> is a <S%H7151>city<s%> of them that <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, and is <S%H6121>polluted<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

And as <S%H1416>troops<s%> of robbers <S%H2442>wait<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%>, so the <S%H2267>company<s%> of <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7523>murder<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H7926%H7927>consent<s%>: for they <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H2154>lewdness<s%>.

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> an horrible <S%H8186>thing<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: there is the <S%H2184>whoredom<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled<s%>.
Also, O <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, he hath <S%H7896>set<s%> an <S%H7105>harvest<s%> for thee, when I <S%H7725>returned<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>.
